00159 static inline struct ptlrpc_request *
00160 ptlrpc_nrs_req_get_nolock(struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt, bool hp,
00161                           bool force)
00162 {
00163         return ptlrpc_nrs_req_get_nolock0(svcpt, hp, false, force);
00164 }
00165 
00166 static inline struct ptlrpc_request *
00167 ptlrpc_nrs_req_peek_nolock(struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt, bool hp)
00168 {
00169         return ptlrpc_nrs_req_get_nolock0(svcpt, hp, true, false);
00170 }

00184 static inline bool nrs_svcpt_has_hp(const struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt)
00185 {
00186         return svcpt->scp_nrs_hp != NULL;
00187 }
00188 
00189 static inline bool nrs_svc_has_hp(const struct ptlrpc_service *svc)
00190 {
00195         return nrs_svcpt_has_hp(svc->srv_parts[0]);
00196 }
00197 
00198 static inline
00199 struct ptlrpc_nrs *nrs_svcpt2nrs(struct ptlrpc_service_part *svcpt, bool hp)
00200 {
00201         LASSERT(ergo(hp, nrs_svcpt_has_hp(svcpt)));
00202         return hp ? svcpt->scp_nrs_hp : &svcpt->scp_nrs_reg;
00203 }
00204 
00205 static inline int nrs_pol2cptid(const struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy)
00206 {
00207         return policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_cpt;
00208 }
00209 
00210 static inline
00211 struct ptlrpc_service *nrs_pol2svc(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy)
00212 {
00213         return policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt->scp_service;
00214 }
00215 
00216 static inline
00217 struct ptlrpc_service_part *nrs_pol2svcpt(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy)
00218 {
00219         return policy->pol_nrs->nrs_svcpt;
00220 }
00221 
00222 static inline
00223 struct cfs_cpt_table *nrs_pol2cptab(struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *policy)
00224 {
00225         return nrs_pol2svc(policy)->srv_cptable;
00226 }
00227 
00228 static inline struct ptlrpc_nrs_resource *
00229 nrs_request_resource(struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00230 {
00231         LASSERT(nrq->nr_initialized);
00232         LASSERT(!nrq->nr_finalized);
00233 
00234         return nrq->nr_res_ptrs[nrq->nr_res_idx];
00235 }
00236 
00237 static inline
00238 struct ptlrpc_nrs_policy *nrs_request_policy(struct ptlrpc_nrs_request *nrq)
00239 {
00240         return nrs_request_resource(nrq)->res_policy;
00241 }

00320 static inline bool ptlrpc_recoverable_error(int rc)
00321 {
00322         return (rc == -ENOTCONN || rc == -ENODEV);
00323 }

00352 static inline void ptlrpc_reqset_put(struct ptlrpc_request_set *set)
00353 {
00354         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&set->set_refcount))
00355                 OBD_FREE_PTR(set);
00356 }
00357 
00359 static inline void ptlrpc_req_comm_init(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00360 {
00361         spin_lock_init(&req->rq_lock);
00362         atomic_set(&req->rq_refcount, 1);
00363         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&req->rq_list);
00364         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&req->rq_replay_list);
00365 }
00366 
00368 static inline void ptlrpc_cli_req_init(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00369 {
00370         struct ptlrpc_cli_req *cr = &req->rq_cli;
00371 
00372         ptlrpc_req_comm_init(req);
00373 
00374         req->rq_receiving_reply = 0;
00375         req->rq_req_unlinked = req->rq_reply_unlinked = 1;
00376 
00377         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cr->cr_set_chain);
00378         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cr->cr_ctx_chain);
00379         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&cr->cr_unreplied_list);
00380         init_waitqueue_head(&cr->cr_reply_waitq);
00381         init_waitqueue_head(&cr->cr_set_waitq);
00382 }
00383 
00385 static inline void ptlrpc_srv_req_init(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00386 {
00387         struct ptlrpc_srv_req *sr = &req->rq_srv;
00388 
00389         ptlrpc_req_comm_init(req);
00390         req->rq_srv_req = 1;
00391         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&sr->sr_exp_list);
00392         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&sr->sr_timed_list);
00393         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&sr->sr_hist_list);
00394 }
00395 
00396 static inline bool ptlrpc_req_is_connect(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00397 {
00398         if (lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == MDS_CONNECT ||
00399             lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == OST_CONNECT ||
00400             lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == MGS_CONNECT)
00401                 return true;
00402         else
00403                 return false;
00404 }
00405 
00406 static inline bool ptlrpc_req_is_disconnect(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00407 {
00408         if (lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == MDS_DISCONNECT ||
00409             lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == OST_DISCONNECT ||
00410             lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == MGS_DISCONNECT)
00411                 return true;
00412         else
00413                 return false;
00414 }
